'''Piping-Hot Braised Meat''' is a Quest Item obtained during the "[[Contraption-Contrived Cooking Course: Part III]]" Event [[World Quest]]. Three copies of this item will automatically be added into the player's [[inventory]] and will then be given to [[Cloud Retainer]].
